trelloHelp: âš™ï¸ There are three steps to integrate your schedules with Trello: 1. Authorize your Trello account. By sending command /trello 2. Pin one of your boards to current chat. By sending command /trello_pin <id_of_board> 3. Choose to which list of that board reminds will be duplicated. By clicking the command near required list. Full list of commands: ğŸ—„ /trello Authorizes user and displays all his boards with their id. ğŸ”– /trello_pin <id_of_board> Pins entered board to current chat. ğŸ“Œ /trello_unpin Unpins board from current chat. To deauthorize your Trello account send: /trello clear
